comment.author: Raegan
comment.text: The claims against Trump have been unraveling. And they are connecting the dots to the Hillary Campaign! Donald J. Trump is certainly not a perfect man, but the Liberal Media and his opponents have used dirty tricks and slander to stop his victory! Drain the Swamp! Vote Trump/Pence MAGA 2016

replies.author: Chelsea
replies.text: # I'm with her all the way respect my vote like I respect yours . I'm not trying to argue.

replies.author: Clint
replies.text: Trump is a big bully , sexist,divisive, racist and a toxic figure . He is like a cancer and pollution for the Republican Party and American politics😵😵😵👎👎👎 Hillary Clinton and Tim Kaine 2016!!!😄😄😄👍👍👍👍

replies.author: Clint
replies.text: Trump represents the danger for USA and the whole world . Trump is unfit to have the control of the nuclear arsenal. When Trump said that "He knows more about Isis than the Generals Do " I can't imagine having Donald Trump in the White House he is like a nightmare for USA and the entirely world.😵😵😵😵😵 Hillary for President 2016!!!👍👍👍

replies.author: Raegan
replies.text: Clint I totally disagree, the danger is a woman who has the FBI investigating her possible Treason, Espionage and Racketeering crimes against our nation. She should not even be given a Security Clearance.
